mapper.insert: insert into blog values(#{id}, '${name} 님의 블로그 입니다.', '/images/spring-logo.jpg')
mapper.select: select user_id as userId, title, logo from blog where user_id = #{user_id}

select a.blog_id as blogID, a.no as categoryNo, a.name as categoryName, a.description, count(b.category_no) as postCount from category a left join post b on a.no= b.category_no where blog_id=#{id} group by a.no order by a.no desc

choose.when: update blog set title = #{title} where user_id = #{userId}
choose.otherwise: update blog set title = #{title}, logo = #{logo} where user_id = #{userId}
